https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2yTwzpgMFteCVpNqFbNyDQyyLjv.jpg Sophie's 18th birthday becomes a bloodbath when monsters descend upon her house, devouring the guests and killing anyone who tries to leave. To survive the night, Sophie must face her destiny: monsters are real and she's the only one who can stop them. Book of Monsters
